question: Sandeep Michael, who passed away recently, was the noted player of which sports?
explanation: Sandeep Michael (37), the former international hockey player, has passed away in Bangaluru, Karnataka on  23 November 2018.   He was a field hockey player who played as a forward for the India national field hockey team. Michael captained the National Junior team to Gold in the Asia Cup before being inducted into the Senior team. He was employed with Air India.
